text: .@SenateGOP has a few other ideas to secure the border that Pres. Biden is welcome to borrow.

The Biden administration has finally come to the realization that the southern border needs a physical barrier to help deter illegal immigration. It only took sustained record-breaking levels of border crossings  – on the president's watch – to reluctantly embrace this solution.

Now is the worst possible time to create a federal staffing mandate for nursing homes as they struggle with workforce shortage issues. That's why I joined my colleagues in urging the Biden administration to abandon plans to enact one. ⬇️

Congratulations to Andrew Harrison, our third Arkansas recipient of #MilkenAward this year. As a coach and educator, he takes every opportunity to pour into students so they can excel in the classroom and beyond.

It was great to visit with Arkansas @nature_org team members today as we discussed the #FarmBill and conservation policies to support farmers and the preservation of wildlife habitat in our state. #ARinDC

We must ensure all incoming requests for veterans' military service records are met with a timely response. I joined my colleagues in asking NARA about the backlog of record requests and the efforts underway to address it.

So pleased they could be there and see the great work you all are doing. We appreciate you!

Congratulations to @SdaleSchools' Michael Tapee on this recognition. We're proud of the work educators like him do to inspire more interest in STEM learning and help students reach their full potential.

Humbled and grateful to have been recognized for my work shaping #veterans’ health care and benefits policies by @TAPSorg & Blinded American Veterans Foundation recently. I’m proud to help ensure we fulfill our nation’s commitment to these heroes.

Cathy and I send our prayers and deepest condolences to Sen. Dianne Feinstein's loved ones. She was a pioneer who truly loved public service on behalf of California and our nation. Dianne's seriousness and kindness are integral parts of her legacy that we should always remember.
